title: Nouveau Carré Recipe
full_text:
Nouveau Carré Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
45 mins
Cook
10 mins
Active
1 min
Total
55 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
anejo tequila
(or anejo sotol)
3/4
ounce
Bénédictine
1/4
ounce
Lillet Blanc
3
dashes
Peychaud's bitters
Lemon twist
, for garnish
Directions
Combine tequila (or sotol), Benedictine, Lillet, and bitters in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until well chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into chilled coupe glass; twist lemon peel over drink and use as garnish.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass, bar spoon, strainer
Tequila
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
